Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.uc.dei.mobilerobotsimulator.Main

extends java.lang.Object
    Main class includes methods for generating environment and for saving data into files.

      • generateEnviroment

        public static int[] generateEnviroment(java.util.ArrayList<Agent> agents,
                       java.lang.String fileName)
        It generates all Environment, Agents and Objects, based on data in file
        Parameters:
        agents - empty list of agents, where agents are added after creation
        fileName - the name of the file, which we includes data for creation environment, agents and objects *
        Returns:
        null if everything was okay, or error message if something went wrong, e.g. wrong file

      • returnData

                          int moves,
                          java.lang.String folderName)
        Moves the agents in environment and return memory data of agents
        Parameters:
        agents - list of all agents
        moves - number of agents' moves
        folderName - the name of the folder where we want to create files with data
        Returns:
        memory data of agents
